mapper.sql: order_transfer_id, sub_order_id, order_id, transfer_status, goods_type, goods_id, goods_code, goods_name, colore_code, colore_name, size_code, size_name, sku, erp_sku, erp_style_no, erp_colore_code, erp_colore_name, erp_size_code, erp_size_name, price, price_discount, price_share, quantity, amount, amount_discount, apply_store, apply_user, apply_time, apply_address, apply_contactor, apply_phone, apply_postcode, dispatch_user, dispatch_time, dispatch_store, refuse_store, refuse_user, refuse_time, accept_user, accept_time, delivery_user, delivery_time, delivery_address, delivery_contactor, delivery_phone, delivery_postcode, express_id, express_name, express_no, receive_user, receive_time, erp_send_status_delivery, erp_send_status_receive, deleted, update_user_id, update_time, insert_user_id, insert_time
mapper.select:
select
from public.ord_transfer_list where transfer_status in ('31','32') and (erp_send_status_delivery = '20' or erp_send_status_receive = '20')

select l.order_transfer_id, l.sub_order_id, l.order_id, l.transfer_status, c.display_cn transfer_status_name, l.sku, l.quantity, g.goods_name_cn goods_name, g.color_name colore_name, g.size_name, s1.store_name_cn apply_store, l.apply_user,l.apply_time, s2.store_name_cn dispatch_store, l.dispatch_time, u.user_name delivery_user, l.delivery_time, u1.user_name receive_user,l.receive_time, delivery_address, delivery_contactor, delivery_phone, delivery_postcode, express_id, express_name, express_no from ord_transfer_list l left join view_erp_goods g on l.sku=g.sku left join com_code c on c.code='TRANSFER_STATUS' and c.value=l.transfer_status left join erp_store s1 on s1.store_code=l.apply_store left join erp_store s2 on s2.store_code=l.dispatch_store left join sys_user u on u.login_id=l.delivery_user left join sys_user u1 on u1.login_id=l.receive_user where l.deleted='0' AND order_transfer_id = #{orderTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select apply_store.order_transfer_id, apply_store.goods_name, apply_store.quantity, apply_store.apply_contactor, apply_store.apply_phone, apply_store.apply_pname, apply_store.apply_cname, apply_store.apply_dname, apply_store.apply_address1, dispatch_store.dispatch_uname, dispatch_store.dispatch_pname, dispatch_store.dispatch_cname, dispatch_store.dispatch_dname, dispatch_store.dispatch_address1 from (select ot.*,ep.pname as apply_pname,ec.cname as apply_cname,ed.dname as apply_dname,es.address as apply_address1 from public.ord_transfer_list ot join ord_sub_list os on ot.sub_order_id=os.sub_order_id join erp_store es on ot.apply_store = es.store_code left join erp_province ep on es.province_code = ep.pcode left join erp_city ec on es.city_code = ec.ccode left join erp_district ed on es.district_code = ed.dcode where order_transfer_id = #{orderTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )as apply_store,
(select su.user_name as dispatch_uname,ep.pname as dispatch_pname,ec.cname as dispatch_cname,ed.dname as dispatch_dname,es.address as dispatch_address1 from public.ord_transfer_list ot join sys_user su on ot.delivery_user = su.login_id join erp_store es on ot.dispatch_store = es.store_code left join erp_province ep on es.province_code = ep.pcode left join erp_city ec on es.city_code = ec.ccode left join erp_district ed on es.district_code = ed.dcode where order_transfer_id = #{orderTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )as dispatch_store
